alert.note: Alert for Big Cypress; Glades County; Glades County Lake Region; Hendry County; Hendry County Lakes Region; Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Inland Palm Beach County; Mainland Monroe; Northern Collier; Southwest Collier (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued January 15 at 2:37AM EST until January 15 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM NOON EST TODAY THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON FOR VERY LOW HUMIDITIES, HIGH ERC VALUES AND MODERATE WINDS FOR NORTHERN AND INTERIOR AREAS OF SOUTH FLORIDA... The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a Fire Weather Watch for very low humidities, high ERC values, and moderate winds, which is in effect from noon EST today through this afternoon. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 071 Inland Broward, Fire Weather Zone 073 Inland Miami-Dade, Fire Weather Zone 075 Mainland Monroe, Fire Weather Zone 163 Glades County Lake Region, Fire Weather Zone 166 Hendry County Lake Region, Fire Weather Zone 170 Big Cypress Preserve, Fire Weather Zone 263 Glades County, Fire Weather Zone 266 Hendry County, Fire Weather Zone 267 Inland Palm Beach County, Fire Weather Zone 270 Northern Collier County and Fire Weather Zone 370 Southwest Collier County. * TIMING...This afternoon and early evening. * WIND...Northwest around 10 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 24 percent. * ERC...UPPER 20S TO LOW 40S.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
